com.ioopm

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ioopm.Person
      • com.ioopm.Player

  • public class Player
extends Person

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(java.lang.String name, java.util.ArrayList<Course> startCourses, Room startRoom)
      Creates the player with a name, 60 HP, an empty inventory, a set of finished courses, no unfinished courses and a start room

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
      java.util.ArrayList<Course> startCourses,

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • go

        public void go(java.lang.String direction)
        Moves the player, if possible, in the given direction, prints the description of the new room and the teachers in the room may ask questions. If not possible, a message is printed.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction [north, east, south, or west] to go

      • unlock

        public void unlock(java.lang.String direction)
        Use a key in the inventory to unlock a door in the given direction. Prints a message if there is no door in the given direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of the door to unlock

      • pickup

        Talk to a student or a sphinx
        Parameters:

      • trade

        public void trade(Student student)
        Give a student the book of the student's current course in exchange for the book to the student's finished course
        Parameters:
        student - the student to trade with

      • graduate

        public void graduate()
        Graduate if the player has >= 180 HP, no unfinished courses and is in the same room as the sphinx

        Parameters:
